isTextControlFilled

public static boolean isTextControlFilled(JTextComponent tc,
                                          String errorMessage)
                                   throws SdkException
Checks if a text control is filled. If errorMessage is null an SdkException will be thrown with the specified error message.

Parameters:
tc - JTextComponent
errorMessage - String
Returns:
boolean
Throws:
SdkException
